channel.title: ATACseq on Monash Bioinformatics Platform
channel.description: Recent content in ATACseq on Monash Bioinformatics Platform

item.title: ATACSeq - What's a peak anyway? By Michael See from Monash Bioinformatics Platform
item.description: Assay for Transposase Accessible Chromatin with high-throughput sequencing (ATACSeq) is a method for probing open regions of chromatin in the genome
